thread.title: BRIEF-‍RMH Franchise Holdings Provides Notice Of Data Incident

title: BRIEF-‍RMH Franchise Holdings Provides Notice Of Data Incident
text: March 2, 2018 / 8:04 PM / Updated 38 minutes ago BRIEF-‍RMH Franchise Holdings Provides Notice Of Data Incident Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 2 (Reuters) - ‍RMH Franchise Holdings: * RECENTLY LEARNED ABOUT DATA INCIDENT AFFECTING SOME PAYMENT CARDS USED AT RMH-OWNED, -OPERATED APPLEBEE’S RESTAURANTS​ * ‍OPERATES POINT-OF-SALE SYSTEMS ISOLATED FROM BROADER APPLEBEE’S NETWORK, NOTICE APPLIES ONLY TO RMH-OWNED APPLEBEE’S RESTAURANTS​‍​ * ‍ALTHOUGH EXACT DATES VARY BY LOCATION, IN MOST CASES DATA INCIDENT COULD POTENTIALLY HAVE AFFECTED PURCHASES BETWEEN DEC. 6 & JAN. 2, 2018​ * SAYS PAYMENTS MADE ONLINE OR USING SELF-PAY TABLETOP DEVICES WERE NOT AFFECTED BY DATA INCIDENT​ Source text for Eikon:
